Install SuMMIT¶

SuMMIT is a package developped for Python3.x.

To sum up what you need to run the platform :

  • Python 3 is required. Download and install Python 3.

Launching the setup tool¶

To install SuMMIT, it is recommended to use a virtual environment. Then, run in a terminal the following command, in the summit directory

$ pip install -e .
